metadata.name: Escape
metadata.description:
Beltran and Niririn, main heroes of my graphic novel Glint, trying to escape from the battlefield. 
They can't trust anyone else but themselves anymore.

(Glint is a graphic novel about people unknown to each other who are destined to be drawn into a conflict that began 1,000 years ago. It's epic mix of sci-fi and fantasy tale).

Hand-drawn illustration
4318x2408px, 300ppx
